00030 namespace data {template<typename TYPE> class ValuePtr;}
00031 namespace util

00033 template<typename TYPE> class Value;
00034 
00035 namespace _internal
00036 {
00037 
00038 class GenericValue
00039 {
00040 protected:
00041     template<typename T> T &m_cast_to() {
00042         LOG_IF( getTypeID() != T::staticID, Debug, error ) << "using " << getTypeName() << " at " << this << " as " << T::staticName() << " aborting ...";
00043         assert( getTypeID() == T::staticID );
00044         return *dynamic_cast<T *>( this );// @todo maybe Mac doesn't like that (http://www.cocoabuilder.com/archive/xcode/247376-rtti-dynamic-cast-across-shared-module-boundaries.html)
00045     }
00046     template<typename T> const T &m_cast_to()const {
00047         LOG_IF( getTypeID() != T::staticID, Debug, error ) << "using " << getTypeName() << " at " << this << " as " << T::staticName() << " aborting ...";
00048         assert( getTypeID() == T::staticID );
00049         return *dynamic_cast<const T *>( this );// @todo maybe Mac doesn't like that (http://www.cocoabuilder.com/archive/xcode/247376-rtti-dynamic-cast-across-shared-module-boundaries.html)
00050     }
00051 
00052 public:
00054     virtual std::string toString( bool labeled = false )const = 0;
00055 
00057     virtual std::string getTypeName()const = 0;
00058 
00060     virtual unsigned short getTypeID()const = 0;
00061 
00063     bool isSameType( const GenericValue &second )const;
00064     virtual ~GenericValue() {}
00065 };
00066 
00075 template<typename TYPE_TYPE> class ValueReference: protected boost::scoped_ptr<TYPE_TYPE>
00076 {
00077     template<typename TT> friend class data::ValuePtr; //allow Value and ValuePtr to use the protected contructor below
00078     template<typename TT> friend class Value;
00079 protected:
00080     //dont use this directly
00081     ValueReference( TYPE_TYPE *t ): boost::scoped_ptr<TYPE_TYPE>( t ) {}
00082 public:
00084     TYPE_TYPE *operator->() const {return boost::scoped_ptr<TYPE_TYPE>::operator->();}
00085     TYPE_TYPE &operator*() const {return boost::scoped_ptr<TYPE_TYPE>::operator*();}
00087     ValueReference() {}
00093     ValueReference( const ValueReference &src ): boost::scoped_ptr<TYPE_TYPE>( NULL ) {
00094         operator=( src );
00095     }
00096     ValueReference( const TYPE_TYPE &src ): boost::scoped_ptr<TYPE_TYPE>( NULL ) {
00097         operator=( src );
00098     }
00106     ValueReference<TYPE_TYPE>& operator=( const ValueReference<TYPE_TYPE> &src ) {
00107         boost::scoped_ptr<TYPE_TYPE>::reset( src.isEmpty() ? 0 : src->clone() );
00108         return *this;
00109     }
00115     ValueReference<TYPE_TYPE>& operator=( const TYPE_TYPE &src ) {
00116         boost::scoped_ptr<TYPE_TYPE>::reset( src.clone() );
00117         return *this;
00118     }
00120     bool isEmpty()const {
00121         return boost::scoped_ptr<TYPE_TYPE>::get() == NULL;
00122     }
00123     const std::string toString( bool label = false )const {
00124         if ( isEmpty() )
00125             return std::string( "\xd8" ); //ASCII code empty set
00126         else
00127             return this->get()->toString( label );
00128     }
00129 };
